Articles.Content:
Hi all. I just built a mining base in minmus north pole (90% ore cutoff). I landed an ISRU module, a x2 drill o matic mining excavator module and two tank modules.

Here's a nice screenshot of my awesome base of awesomeness

I have a two stars Engineer operating that excavators, Tested in kerbin base and worked good.

But, as you can see, when I try to start the surface harvester it says "nothing to harvest"

What am I doing wrong?

Thanks in advance

Zeke

Edited October 21, 2015 by ezequielandrush
Polar area is known to have interpolation error on the map. What's the data that surface scanner shows?

you landed in a spot with no ore.

Use a narrow band scanner, drive around with the surface scanner... or modify your overlay .cfg file to reduce the interpolation level

Oh... I didn't know about the interpolation error....

Thanks!

Zeke
